## Corporation.nextUpdate() method

Sleep until the next Corporation update has happened.

**Signature:**

```typescript
nextUpdate(): Promise<number>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;number&gt;

Promise that resolves to the number of milliseconds of Corporation time that were processed in the previous update.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 1 GB

The amount of real time spent asleep between updates can vary due to "bonus time".

## Example


```js
while (await ns.corporation.nextUpdate()) {
  // Manage the Corporation
}
```
